definition: not to mention ... (i.e. in addition to sth)
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: Man: Slow down and tell me your address.
sentences.chinese: 慢慢說，告訴我你的住址。

sentences.english: "I have perhaps given a false impression of my life, " she said slowly.
sentences.chinese: 我也許給了我生活的一個錯誤的意念，“她慢慢說。”

sentences.english: When she teaches, she tries to speak easy English very slowly.
sentences.chinese: 教課的時候，她會設法以簡單的英語慢慢說。

sentences.english: Chen in the north of Europe joined vegetables as farmland dream and slowly said.
sentences.chinese: 歐北辰給田夢添了菜，慢慢說着。

sentences.english: Slow down and tell me your address.
sentences.chinese: 慢慢說，告訴我你的住址。

sentences.english: Take it easy, madam. And speak slowly. May I have your name first?
sentences.chinese: 女士，請別急。慢慢說。請先告訴我您得名字好嗎？

sentences.english: It should be told slowly, quietly and with intensity of emotion.
sentences.chinese: 這些故事應該慢慢說，靜靜地說，並帶有情緒強度。

sentences.english: " I said to the girl, you sit down slowly said, "?
sentences.chinese: “我說，這位姑娘你先坐下慢慢說可好”？

sentences.english: Should not be anxious, slowly said.
Say the words slowly a couple of times.
sentences.chinese: 把這幾個字慢慢說幾次。
